if(MSVC)
add_compile_options("$<$<C_COMPILER_ID:MSVC>:/utf-8>")
add_compile_options("$<$<CXX_COMPILER_ID:MSVC>:/utf-8>")
endif()

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.4)

project("SSViewer2")


list(APPEND CMAKE_MODULE_PATH "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/FRUT/prefix/FRUT/cmake")
include(Reprojucer)


set(Viewer2_jucer_FILE
  "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/Viewer2.jucer"
)


set(JUCE_MODULES_GLOBAL_PATH "d:/Users/uribow/My Documeacnts/GitHub/SpriteStudio6-SDK/Scripts/../Build/Viewer2/JUCE/modules")


jucer_project_begin(
  JUCER_VERSION "5.4.5"
  PROJECT_FILE "${Viewer2_jucer_FILE}"
  PROJECT_ID "pETMlY"
)

  PROJECT_NAME "SSViewer2"

)
